.```python
# Correlation matrix for numeric stats
numeric_cols = ['Total', 'HP', 'Attack', 'Defense', 'Sp. Atk', 'Sp. Def', 'Speed']
corr = df[numeric_cols].corr()
print("Correlation matrix:")
print(corr)

# Average Total by Generation
avg_total_gen = df.groupby('Generation')['Total'].mean().reset_index()
print("\nAverage Total by Generation:")
print(avg_total_gen)

# Average Total by Legendary status
avg_total_legend = df.groupby('Legendary')['Total'].mean().reset_index()
print("\nAverage Total by Legendary status:")
print(avg_total_legend)

# Count of Pokémon per Generation and Legendary
gen_legend_counts = df.groupby(['Generation', 'Legendary']).size().unstack(fill_value=0)
print("\nCount of Pokémon by Generation and Legendary:")
print(gen_legend_counts)
```
